markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Signature Spell Expansion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1823) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 27, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 140 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom. You gain two additional signature spells, each of which must have a minimum level of 3rd or lower.
name: Signature Spell Expansion
